label: logicA:history_en
steps: [1] If the British Crown levied new taxes on the American colonies, colonial protests intensified.
[2] If colonial protests intensified, open revolution erupted.
[3] For every figure x, if x was a major Enlightenment thinker, x argued for natural rights.
[4] John Locke was a major Enlightenment thinker.
[5] The British Crown levied new taxes on the American colonies.
[8] John Locke argued for natural rights (from [3] and [4]).
[9] Open revolution erupted and John Locke argued for natural rights (from [7] and [8]).
